attributes.action: Protect consumer payments in case of business failure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow consumers to add to a contract the words "Title to monies paid remains with the buyer until delivery and acceptance of goods" effectively ring fencing the payments from the Receiver in case of business failure or if no money is available allowing the directors of the company to be prosecuted for theft and have their assets seized under the proceeds of crime acts to pay the consumers.
